## Introduccion 

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
clima <- read_xlsx("clima.xlsx")
consumoenergetico <- read_xlsx('consumoenergiaelectrica.xlsx')

clima$TEMP <- (as.numeric(clima$TEMP)-32)*5/9
clima <- rename(clima,temp_c = TEMP)

clima2 <- clima %>% mutate(Fecha = paste( substr(clima$YEARMODA,1,4), "-", substr(clima$YEARMODA,5,6), "-", substr(clima$YEARMODA,7,8), sep="")) %>% select(c(Fecha, temp_c))

consumoenergetico <- consumoenergetico %>% mutate(Fecha = as.character(Fecha))

colnames(consumoenergetico)

consumoe <- left_join(consumoenergetico, clima2, by = "Fecha")


gather(consumoenergetico, fuente, produccion,`Hidráulica`, `Térmica`, `Eólica`, Biomasa, Fotovoltaica )


```
